So here's the code:

program atcoder_abc142_a
    implicit none
    real(kind=8) :: input, result
    integer :: countOdd

    ! Read input
    read(*,*) input

    ! Compute countOdd as rounded to nearest integer of input/2
    countOdd = nint(input / 2.d0)
    result = dble(countOdd)/input

    ! Write with 10 decimal places
    write(*, '(F12.10)') result

end program atcoder_abc142_a
